---
title: "set_cookies"
description: "Uploads cookies to the session"
---

Accepts either cookies or cookie_file as argument


## Parameters

<ParamField path="cookies" type="list[Cookie] | None">
  The list of cookies (can be obtained from session.get_cookies) (default: None)
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="cookie_file" type="UnionType[str, Path, None]">
  The path to the cookie file (json format) (default: None)
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`SetCookiesResponse`](../misc/setcookiesresponse): The response from the upload cookies request.

## Raises

- `ValueError`: If both cookies and cookie_file are provided, or if neither is provided.
- `ValueError`: If the session hasn't been started yet (no session_id available).
